hero.title: Finding the Perfect Opportunity to Buy House in Sector 108 Gurugram Dwarka Expressway
description: Sector 108 stands out as a premium residential destination offering unparalleled connectivity and lifestyle amenities right off the Dwarka Expressway. If your goal is to buy house in Sector 108, you are choosing a locality known for its superior planning spacious independent floors and access to top-tier social infrastructure. This sector provides a peaceful environment away from the city bustle yet remains centrally located for convenient commuting to Delhi and key business districts of Gurugram.

The availability of freehold residential plots and luxurious ready-to-move builder floors makes Sector 108 highly attractive for families seeking customization and space. Investing here ensures long-term capital appreciation driven by rapid infrastructural development surrounding the upcoming cloverleaf interchanges and strategic positioning near key commercial hubs. Explore verified listings and secure your dream house in this rapidly appreciating Gurugram hotspot.

featuresSection.heading: Exploring the Best Plot Sizes and Configuration Options for Your New House
description: When you plan to buy house in Sector 108, the choice of plot size dictates the potential scale and design of your future residence. Sector 108 offers a wide range of plot dimensions catering to different needs from compact luxury homes to sprawling bungalows ensuring every buyer finds a perfect fit.

These popular plot sizes in Sector 108 Gurugram are ideal for constructing customized G+2 or G+3 builder floors or independent villas providing maximum flexibility and design freedom for homeowners seeking personalized living spaces.

features.title: 4 Marla Plot Ideal for Compact Houses
features.description: A 4 Marla plot generally converts to around 100 square yards making it a fantastic option for young professionals or small nuclear families looking to construct a cozy yet functional independent house. This size allows for efficient utilization of space often accommodating a well-designed 3 BHK layout on each floor providing an excellent entry point for ownership in Sector 108 Gurugram.

features.title: 6 Marla Plot Perfect for Mid-Size Families
features.description: Equivalent to approximately 150 square yards the 6 Marla plot is extremely popular among families seeking balance between space and affordability. When you buy house in Sector 108 built on this dimension you secure sufficient room for large living areas dedicated parking and modest backyard space perfect for comfortable modern living and future expansion possibilities.

features.title: 8 Marla Plot Offering Premium Residential Scale
features.description: The 8 Marla plot size translates to about 200 square yards providing ample dimensions for crafting a truly premium house. Homeowners often choose this size to build spacious 4 BHK luxury residences featuring dedicated servant quarters home offices and expansive balconies ensuring privacy and luxury in Sector 108's evolving landscape.

features.title: 10 Marla Plot For Large Luxurious Custom Homes
features.description: Around 250 square yards the 10 Marla plots are sought after by high-net-worth individuals who desire significant space and bespoke architectural designs. These plots allow for the construction of elaborate villas with private elevators home theatres and extensive landscaping creating a benchmark for luxury living in Sector 108 Gurugram.

features.title: 12 Marla Plot Exceptional Space and Design Freedom
features.description: Offering approximately 300 square yards this plot size provides maximum flexibility for architectural brilliance. Buying a house built on a 12 Marla plot in Sector 108 means you can incorporate large front and back lawns multiple car parking spaces and grand double-height living areas promising an unrivaled residential experience.

features.title: 14 Marla Plot Ultimate Size for Estate Living
features.description: The largest standard size available at roughly 350 square yards the 14 Marla plot caters to those desiring an estate-like feel. This scale is perfect for multi-generational houses or properties requiring extensive outdoor amenities ensuring your investment aligns with the most exclusive properties in Sector 108's residential portfolio.

locationsSection.title: Seamless Connectivity and Proximity to Key Areas near Sector 108 Gurugram
description: Sector 108 is strategically positioned to leverage the infrastructural growth of the Dwarka Expressway making it a prime residential choice. Its location ensures residents enjoy quick access to both Delhi and the established Gurugram commercial hubs minimizing daily commute times.

Understanding the nearby key areas is crucial when you plan to buy house in Sector 108 as connectivity significantly impacts lifestyle and property value. The seamless road network enhances accessibility to major business parks schools and hospitals making it a truly self-sufficient neighbourhood.

whyChoose.title: Eight Compelling Reasons Why You Should Buy House in Sector 108 Gurugram Now
description: Sector 108 is not just a location it is a future-proof investment and a quality lifestyle upgrade. The planned infrastructure high livability scores and rapid development trajectory make it one of the most sought-after sectors along the Dwarka Expressway.
Here are the most significant advantages that reinforce why buying a house here represents a smart decision for both end-users and investors seeking substantial returns.

points.title: Unmatched Connectivity via Dwarka Expressway
points.description: Sector 108 offers direct access to the Dwarka Expressway a crucial lifeline connecting Gurugram to Delhi and the IGI Airport. This excellent road infrastructure guarantees quick and congestion-free travel significantly improving the quality of life for daily commuters and boosting property values due to its premium access points.

points.title: Rapid Infrastructure Development
points.description: The surrounding areas are witnessing massive infrastructure investment including elevated roads new flyovers and the upcoming metro corridor extension. This commitment to superior urban planning ensures that buying a house in Sector 108 places you in a locality poised for continuous appreciation and modern convenience.

points.title: Proximity to Delhi and IGI Airport
points.description: One of Sector 108's greatest strengths is its close proximity to the international airport and the established residential sectors of Dwarka Delhi. This makes it an ideal choice for frequent travelers and those working in Delhi but desiring the space and tranquility of Gurugram.

points.title: Availability of Freehold Residential Plots
points.description: Unlike many developed areas Sector 108 offers a good supply of freehold residential plots allowing buyers to custom-build their dream house exactly to their specifications. This customization option is a major draw for discerning homeowners seeking unique residences rather than standard apartment living.

points.title: Established Social and Retail Amenities
points.description: The sector benefits from access to highly reputed schools world-class hospitals and major retail outlets within a short drive. Families buying a house here are assured of high quality education healthcare and entertainment options readily available minimizing travel for daily needs.

points.title: High Potential for Capital Appreciation
points.description: As the Dwarka Expressway nears full completion property values in Sector 108 are projected to see significant upward movement. Early investment now ensures maximum benefit from this infrastructural boom providing excellent long-term returns for those looking to secure an asset.

points.title: Low Density and Planned Green Spaces
points.description: Sector 108 is known for its lower population density compared to central Gurugram sectors. The planning incorporates wide roads and dedicated green belt areas offering a much better air quality and a calmer environment crucial for families seeking a healthier and more relaxed urban life.

points.title: Secure and Well-Maintained Locality
points.description: The area boasts well-maintained roads reliable utilities and increasing security infrastructure. Homeowners can expect a safe and orderly environment which is paramount when deciding where to buy house and raise a family ensuring peace of mind throughout the residency.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions Before You Decide to Buy House in Sector 108 Gurugram
faqSection.description: We address the most common queries potential buyers have regarding property types investment potential and connectivity in Sector 108 to help you make an informed decision.

faqs.question: What types of residential properties are available to buy house in Sector 108
faqs.answer: Sector 108 primarily offers two main types of residential properties builder floors and independent houses built on residential plots. Builder floors are highly popular offering spacious apartment-like living with rights to the floor and usually come in 3 BHK or 4 BHK configurations with modern amenities. Independent houses constructed on various plot sizes from 4 Marla to 14 Marla provide the ultimate customization and privacy allowing owners complete control over design and structure.

faqs.question: How is the current connectivity of Sector 108 to major city hubs
faqs.answer: Connectivity in Sector 108 is excellent thanks to its prime location right on the Dwarka Expressway. This ensures swift travel to key areas like Cyber City Gurugram the commercial sectors of Udyog Vihar and importantly the Indira Gandhi International Airport which is reachable within a 20-25 minute drive under normal traffic conditions. The sector also enjoys good access to major internal Gurugram road networks and is close to the Delhi border making it highly desirable for regional commuters.

faqs.question: Is Sector 108 considered a good investment for long-term appreciation
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 108 is widely regarded as one of the best areas for long-term real estate investment along the Dwarka Expressway corridor. The combination of established social infrastructure ongoing government spending on regional connectivity and the sectorâ€™s proximity to upcoming commercial developments ensures a strong appreciation curve. Experts predict substantial returns especially as the remaining phases of the expressway project are completed boosting seamless connectivity to Delhi.

faqs.question: What are the typical sizes of builder floors available for sale here
faqs.answer: Builder floors in Sector 108 usually range in size from approximately 150 square yards to 300 square yards depending on the plot size of the construction. Common built-up area sizes are typically between 1200 square feet for a compact 3 BHK to over 2500 square feet for a luxury 4 BHK unit. Buyers should verify the specific carpet area and covered area details when viewing properties as sizes can vary slightly between builders and specific locations within the sector.

faqs.question: What social amenities like schools and hospitals are near Sector 108
faqs.answer: Sector 108 is well-served by quality social infrastructure. Reputed international schools such as DPS Dwarka Expressway and prominent healthcare facilities like Columbia Asia Hospital Palam Vihar are located nearby. Residents have easy access to multiple shopping complexes supermarkets and recreational centers ensuring all essential and lifestyle needs are met within a short radius of the residential areas.

faqs.question: Are there any specific legal considerations when buying a residential plot in Sector 108
faqs.answer: When purchasing a residential plot or house in Sector 108 it is essential to ensure the property has clear freehold title and all necessary approvals from the relevant authorities like DTCP Haryana Town and Country Planning. Buyers must verify the permissible floor area ratio FAR for construction to understand how many floors can legally be built. Always engage a professional legal advisor to perform thorough due diligence on all ownership documents and local body clearances.

faqs.question: Is water supply and electricity infrastructure reliable in Sector 108
faqs.answer: As a developing and highly planned sector Sector 108 benefits from improving utility infrastructure. Water supply is typically managed through corporation lines supplemented by private borewells in some properties. Electricity supply is generally stable though some independent houses and builder floors rely on robust power backup solutions. It is advisable to inquire about the specific utility arrangements and backup systems installed in the property you intend to buy.

faqs.question: How does the pricing of houses in Sector 108 compare to nearby sectors like 109 and 110
faqs.answer: Pricing in Sector 108 is competitive and often slightly premium compared to some newly developing pockets of Sector 109 due to its slightly more established nature and immediate access to key infrastructure points. While Sector 110 might offer varied pricing depending on proximity to the proposed metro line Sector 108 maintains a stable demand for independent houses and builder floors securing its position in the upper-mid segment of the Dwarka Expressway market.

faqs.question: Can Non-Resident Indians NRI easily buy house properties in Sector 108 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Yes Non-Resident Indians NRI are legally permitted to buy both residential and commercial immovable properties in India including houses and plots in Sector 108 Gurugram. The process requires adherence to RBI guidelines which typically involves paying for the property through NRE Non-Resident External or NRO Non-Resident Ordinary bank accounts. Consulting a property lawyer specialized in NRI transactions is recommended to ensure compliance with all regulatory requirements.

faqs.question: What are the common plot sizes available for constructing a new house in this sector
faqs.answer: The residential plots in Sector 108 are predominantly available in standardized sizes based on the Marla system common in this region. The most sought-after dimensions range from 4 Marla 100 sq yards and 6 Marla 150 sq yards suitable for compact or mid-size homes up to 8 Marla 200 sq yards and 10 Marla 250 sq yards for larger luxury constructions. Larger options up to 14 Marla are also available for those requiring substantial space.
